titles.title: Tax Compliance Enforcement Act of 1994
A bill to prohibit delinquent taxpayers from receiving Federal benefits or employment, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13283-13284)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/22/1994--Introduced. Tax Compliance Enforcement Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to prohibit a delinquent taxpayer from receiving Federal benefits or from being hired as an officer or employee of the Government of the United States, including the legislative and judicial branches. Increases certain tax-related criminal fines.
